example/SLED/PDMA/main.c

00029 /* Includes ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00030 #include "ht32.h"
00031 #include "ht32_board_config.h"
00032 
00033 /** @addtogroup HT32_Series_Peripheral_Examples HT32 Peripheral Examples
00034   * @{
00035   */
00036 
00037 /** @addtogroup SLED_Examples SLED
00038   * @{
00039   */
00040 
00041 /** @addtogroup SLED_PDMA
00042   * @{
00043   */
00044 
00045 
00046 /* Settings ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00047 #define LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN            (44)    /* LED strip count                                            */
00048 #define LED_GRB_DATA_LEN              (3)     /* GRB 3 bytes                                                */
00049 #define LED_STRIP_PATN_LEN            (8)
00050 
00051 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00052 void CKCU_Configuration(void);
00053 void SLED_Configuration(void);
00054 void PDMA_Configuration(void);
00055 void SLED_MainRoutine(void);
00056 static void __Delay(u32 count);
00057 
00058 /* Global variables ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00059 u8 gColorTable[LED_STRIP_PATN_LEN][LED_GRB_DATA_LEN] =
00060 {
00061   { 0xFF, 0x66, 0x66 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  70%)
00062   { 0xFF, 0x38, 0x38 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  61%)
00063   { 0xFF, 0x0A, 0x0A }, // HSL(120, 100%,  52%)
00064   { 0xDB, 0x00, 0x00 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  43%)
00065   { 0xAD, 0x00, 0x00 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  34%)
00066   { 0x80, 0x00, 0x00 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  25%)
00067   { 0x52, 0x00, 0x00 }, // HSL(120, 100%,  16%)
00068   { 0x24, 0x00, 0x00 }, // HSL(120, 100%,   7%)
00069 };
00070 
00071 u32 new_pix_cnt = 0;
00072 u8 gDispBuf[LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN][LED_GRB_DATA_LEN];
00073 
00074 /* Global functions ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00075 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00076   * @brief  Main program.
00077   * @retval None
00078   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00079 int main(void)
00080 {
00081   CKCU_Configuration();
00082 
00083   SLED_Configuration();
00084 
00085   PDMA_Configuration();
00086 
00087   while (1)
00088   {
00089     SLED_MainRoutine();
00090     __Delay(SystemCoreClock/200);
00091   }
00092 }
00093 
00094 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00095   * @brief  Configure the SLED.
00096   * @retval None
00097   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00098 void SLED_Configuration(void)
00099 {
00100   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00101      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00102      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00103   */
00104   SLED_InitTypeDef SLED_InitStruct;
00105 
00106   /* Configure GPIO to SLED mode                                                                            */
00107   AFIO_GPxConfig(HTCFG_SLED_GPIO_ID, HTCFG_SLED_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_FUN_SLED);
00108 
00109   /* Configure SLED                                                                                         */
00110   SLED_InitStruct.ClockPrescaler = HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER;  /* F_PCLK/HTCFG_SLED_CK_PRESCALER     = 20 MHz */
00111   SLED_InitStruct.BaudRate       = HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE - 1;  /* F_SCLK/HTCFG_SLED_BAUDRATE         = 800 kHz*/
00112   SLED_InitStruct.T0H            = HTCFG_SLED_T0H - 1;       /* 5/25 = 20% Duty. 1/800K * (5/25)   = 0.25 us*/
00113   SLED_InitStruct.T1H            = HTCFG_SLED_TH1 - 1;       /* 20/25 = 80% Duty. 1/800K * (20/25) = 1.00 us*/
00114   SLED_InitStruct.SyncState      = SLED_SYNC_STATE_T0;
00115   SLED_InitStruct.IdleState      = SLED_IDLE_STATE_LOW;
00116   SLED_InitStruct.ResetState     = SLED_RESET_STATE_LOW;
00117   SLED_InitStruct.SyncMode       = SLED_SYNC_MODE_DISABLE;
00118   SLED_InitStruct.OutputPolarity = SLED_OUTPUT_NONINVERTING;
00119   SLED_Init(HTCFG_SLED, &SLED_InitStruct);
00120 
00121   /* Enable SLED                                                                                            */
00122   SLED_OutputCmd(HTCFG_SLED, ENABLE);
00123   SLED_FIFOTrigLevelConfig(HTCFG_SLED, SLED_FIFO_LEVEL_1);
00124   SLED_Cmd(HTCFG_SLED, ENABLE);
00125 
00126   /* Enable PDMA                                                                                            */
00127   SLED_PDMACmd(HTCFG_SLED, ENABLE);
00128 }
00129 
00130 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00131   * @brief  Configure the PDMA.
00132   * @retval None
00133   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00134 void PDMA_Configuration(void)
00135 {
00136   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00137      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00138      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below this function.
00139   */
00140   PDMACH_InitTypeDef PDMACH_InitStruct;
00141 
00142   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00143   /* Start lighting the LED strip by SLED                                                                   */
00144   /* PDMA Configuration : gDispBuf to HTCFG_SLED->DR, linear increment to fix, 8-bit.                       */
00145   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00146   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_AdrMod   = AUTO_RELOAD | SRC_ADR_LIN_INC | DST_ADR_FIX;
00147   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_SrcAddr  = (u32)&gDispBuf[0][0];
00148   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_DstAddr  = (u32)&HTCFG_SLED->DR_8BIT;
00149   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00150   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_BlkLen   = LED_GRB_DATA_LEN;
00151   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_BlkCnt   = LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN;
00152   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_Priority = H_PRIO;
00153   PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, &PDMACH_InitStruct);
00154 
00155   /* HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH is used to move the RAM data to the  DR of SLED.                          */
00156   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00157 
00158 
00159   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00160   /* Shift the pixel data.                                                                                  */
00161   /* PDMA Configuration : gDispBuf to gDispBuf, linear decrement to linear decrement, 8-bit.                */
00162   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00163   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_AdrMod   = AUTO_RELOAD | SRC_ADR_LIN_DEC | DST_ADR_LIN_DEC;
00164   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_SrcAddr  = (u32)&(gDispBuf[LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN - 2][2]);
00165   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_DstAddr  = (u32)&(gDispBuf[LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN - 1][2]);
00166   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_DataSize = WIDTH_8BIT;
00167   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_BlkLen   = LED_GRB_DATA_LEN;
00168   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_BlkCnt   = LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN - 1;
00169   PDMACH_InitStruct.PDMACH_Priority = M_PRIO;
00170   PDMA_Config(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, &PDMACH_InitStruct);
00171 
00172   /* HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH is used to data shift.                                                   */
00173   PDMA_IntConfig(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, PDMA_INT_TC, ENABLE);
00174 }
00175 
00176 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00177   * @brief  SLED Main Routine.
00178   * @retval None
00179   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00180 void SLED_MainRoutine(void)
00181 {
00182   u32 i;
00183 
00184   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00185   /* Start lighting the LED strip by SLED                                                                   */
00186   /* PDMA Configuration : gDispBuf to HTCFG_SLED->DR, linear increment to fix, 8-bit.                       */
00187   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00188   SLED_InsertResetCode(HTCFG_SLED);
00189   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, ENABLE);
00190 
00191   /* Check transfer finish                                                                                  */
00192   while (PDMA_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, PDMA_FLAG_TC) == RESET);
00193   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, DISABLE);
00194   PDMA_ClearFlag(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_DR_CH, PDMA_FLAG_TC);
00195 
00196   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00197   /* Shift the pixel data.                                                                                  */
00198   /* PDMA Configuration : gDispBuf to gDispBuf, linear decrement to linear decrement, 8-bit.                */
00199   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00200   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, ENABLE);
00201   PDMA_SwTrigCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, ENABLE);
00202 
00203   /* Check transfer finish                                                                                  */
00204   while (PDMA_GetFlagStatus(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, PDMA_FLAG_TC) == RESET);
00205   PDMA_EnaCmd(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, DISABLE);
00206   PDMA_ClearFlag(HTCFG_SLED_PDMA_RAM_TO_RAM_CH, PDMA_FLAG_TC);
00207 
00208   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00209   /* 1. Add new one pixel.                                                                                  */
00210   /* 2. Shift Color Table.                                                                                  */
00211   /*--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00212   /* Add new one pixel                                                                                      */
00213   if (new_pix_cnt < LED_STRIP_PATN_LEN)
00214   {
00215     /* Turn on the LED                                                                                      */
00216     gDispBuf[0][0] = gColorTable[new_pix_cnt][0];
00217     gDispBuf[0][1] = gColorTable[new_pix_cnt][1];
00218     gDispBuf[0][2] = gColorTable[new_pix_cnt][2];
00219   }
00220   else
00221   {
00222     /* Turn off the LED                                                                                     */
00223     gDispBuf[0][0] = 0;
00224     gDispBuf[0][1] = 0;
00225     gDispBuf[0][2] = 0;
00226   }
00227 
00228   /* Shift Color Table                                                                                      */
00229   if (++new_pix_cnt > (LED_STRIP_DISP_LEN - 1))
00230   {
00231     /* Change color                                                                                         */
00232     for (i = 0; i < LED_STRIP_PATN_LEN; i++)
00233     {
00234       u8 tmp;
00235       tmp = gColorTable[i][0];
00236       gColorTable[i][0] = gColorTable[i][1];
00237       gColorTable[i][1] = gColorTable[i][2];
00238       gColorTable[i][2] = tmp;
00239     }
00240     new_pix_cnt = 0;
00241   }
00242 }
00243 
00244 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00245   * @brief  Configure the system clocks.
00246   * @retval None
00247   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00248 void CKCU_Configuration(void)
00249 {
00250   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{ 0 }};
00251   /* Enable SLED & AFIO APB clock                                                                           */
00252   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO             = 1;
00253   CKCUClock.Bit.PDMA             = 1;
00254   HTCFG_SLED_CLK(CKCUClock)      = 1;
00255   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00256 }
00257 
00258 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00259 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00260   * @brief  delay function
00261   * @param  count: delay count for loop
00262   * @retval None
00263   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00264 static void __Delay(u32 count)
00265 {
00266   while (count--)
00267   {
00268     __NOP(); // Prevent delay loop be optimized
00269   }
00270 }
